titleStmt.title: The Great robbery in Hatton-garden a true account how about twenty thieves on Sunday the 29th of Decemb. 1678, in the evening, entred a gentlemans house there under pretence of a search and putting the family in fear of their lives rob'd them of about 400 ounces of plate, two diamond rings ... near twenty pounds in money &c. : with a relation how they were discovered and five of them apprehended ... their commitment to Newgate where they now remain &c.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
